Believe God's Promise.--Those who work for God will meet with discouragement, but the promise is always theirs: "Lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world." Matthew 28:20. God will give a most 
                                                                           116
wonderful experience to those who will say: "I believe Thy promise; I will not fail nor become discouraged." --Testimonies, vol. 6, pp. 335, 336. (1900)
